posts.title: Hair Growing Helmet
posts.content: Toss out that bottle of Rogaine, because Science™ and lasers have teamed up to create an infallible technique to re-grow your hair and stop balding at the source! Just put the hair growing helmet on, don’t ask questions, and let the lasers take care of the rest.

posts.title: Halo Master Chief Motorcycle Helmet
posts.content: Transform yourself into Master Chief by hitting the streets wearing this Halo Master Chief motorcycle helmet. This DOT-approved helmet comes with features such as a glove-friendly opening mechanism and front air intakes to reduce fogging.

posts.title: Mega Construx Jumbo Pikachu Kit
posts.content: Bring your favorite electric type Pokemon to life by building your very own Pikachu with this Mega Construx kit. This entertaining DIY kit comes with everything you’ll need to craft a cool little Pikachu standing over twelve inches tall.

posts.title: Black Pine Bonsai Tree Kit
posts.content: Give your zen garden a stylish touch by growing your own black pine bonsai tree. Ideal for those who love to get their hands dirty, the kit comes with everything you’ll need to successfully grow a beautiful miniature Black Pine tree.

posts.title: Sticker Toilet Plunger
posts.content: Unclogging your toilet is easier than ever thanks to this sticker toilet plunger. Instead of having to insert a plunger into poop-ridden water, simply place the sticker over the toilet and flush to create an air bubble – then push down on the bubble to unclog the toilet.

posts.title: Mr. Meeseeks Dice & Dare Game
posts.content: If you have a problem that needs fixing but don’t know where to start, leave it to the Mr. Meeseeks dice and dare game. Players take turns drawing request cards, then roll the dice to see if the request if completed, if not they have to perform embarrassing dares.

posts.title: LEGO Ship In A Bottle
posts.content: A little over a year ago, Jake Sadovich submitted an awesome idea to the LEGO Idea platform that you can now purchase – the LEGO ship in a bottle set. With this set you’ll be able to build a historic sailing vessel – complete with a captain’s quarter and cannons.

posts.title: Geeky Vincent van Gogh Paintings
posts.content: Show off your fondness for the classics with these geeky Vincent van Gogh paintings. Each vibrant work of art displays a unique and vibrant mashup of geeky franchises like Star Wars or Super Mario Bros. painted in van Gogh’s iconic style.

posts.title: Heated Foot Rest Hammock
posts.content: Achieve maximum comfort during the workday with help from the heated foot rest hammock. Made of soft fleece, the foot rest keeps your tired feet suspended as a built-in heater ensures they stay nice and toasty while you’re stuck in that ice cube you call a cubicle.

posts.title: Samsung 49″ Curved Gaming Monitor
posts.content: Experience your favorite games in a whole new light with the Samsung 49″ curved gaming monitor. Equivalent to two side by side 16:9 monitors, this giant 32:9 super ultra-wide screen allows for seamless multitasking along with a rapid 144Hz refresh rate.

posts.title: Faux Wolf Fur Bedspread
posts.content: Winter is coming – ensure you are warm and toasty when the temperature dips by getting under this faux wolf fur bedspread. This luxurious bedspread is crafted entirely from animal friendly faux fur and is given unique style accents to create a realistic appearance.

posts.title: F*cker In Charge Name Plate
posts.content: Let all the inferior drones know who runs shit in your office using this “fucker in charge” name plate. This office appropriate piece is clearly engraved with a comical and crass title against a classy gold backdrop that will blend in beautifully with any office decor.
